Class AbstractDBCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • marauroa.server.db.command.AbstractDBCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBCommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DBCommandWithCallback, LogGameEventCommand, LogStatisticsCommand, StoreCharacterCommand, StoreZoneCommand

    public abstract class AbstractDBCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBCommand
    An abstract asynchronous database command.

    hendrik, madmetzger
